title: Zuckerberg praises Meta executives day after laying off 4,000 workers
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Thursday defended the job performance of senior leaders at the social media company, a day after laying off 4,000 workers.

title: Four minutes til failure: Watch SpaceX’s Starship come apart in flight
description: On Thursday, SpaceX’s Starship was about four minutes into flight when it exploded. See what we know happened so far.

title: SpaceX’s Starship lifts off successfully, but explodes in first flight
description: Still, it was widely hailed as a success, with congratulations coming from NASA.

title: How Facebook users can apply for a share of $725 million settlement
description: Millions of Facebook users can get money back as part of a class action settlement over alleged Cambridge Analytica privacy violations.

title: Live updates: SpaceX tries again to launch Starship
description: The first effort was stopped moments before blast off by a frozen valve.

title: 5 ways to love tech without killing the planet
description: How to buy and use technology responsibly when you care about the Earth.

title: Dead birds are flying again — this time, as drones
description: Mostafa Hassanalian, an engineering professor at a New Mexico college, is using drone technology to enable taxidermied birds to fly.

title: Thousands poised to lose verification badges at Elon Musk’s Twitter
description: Elon Musk has been pushing for Twitter to remove legacy verification badges for months.
